task.summary: Improve server structure + add some working tests
Set Now default alias in package.json
Fix tests error (server was not properly closed)
Links are now compatible with routes translation
[WIP] Write tests for routes + set PORT in process.env
Add a very basic lang switch
Lang switcher is now making redirection to the same page :)
Fix now config file and add pipeline alias creation instruction
Restrict pipeline deployment instructions to git develop branch
Fix pipeline yml config file structure
Try to fix the preprod urls by saving the baseURL to a env variable
Update the pipeline file to make the tests be run on develop branch
Update the pipeline file to make the tests be run on develop branch
Still trying to make the url resolution working on the preprod
Fix port negotiation errors when the default port is already used
Update test to make them work with enzym and React components
Change plural separator in i18next (use '__' instead of '_')
Add Head comment with meta tags support
Try not to publish on Now in public mode
Add server password protection for the pre-production
Replace bitbucket secrets by now secrets + new npm scripts
Add a server script that checks if all the required files are present before launching the app (long commit sry)
